item.title: Geni: Breaking CSIDH via Torsion Point Leakage
item.description:
Last weekend, I participated in BSides Algiers CTF, hosted by Shellmates, and I was able to win 1st place! I solved all the cryptography challenges, and this writeup will be for the one I found to be the most interesting and hardest: Geni.

At first, I couldn’t understand isogenies very well, but by reading from the CryptoHack Isogeny Challenges, I got a basic understanding that allowed me to start reading the challenge files and understand the underlying mechanics.
